name: BathingOrGroomingHygieneADLIADL
title: Bathing or grooming/hygiene (ADL/IADL)
description: This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing an observation of bathing/grooming/hygiene (ADL/IADL) ability.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an assessment of the person's ability to bathe as an ADL/IADL.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Bathing or grooming/hygiene (ADL/IADL).),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Bathing or grooming/hygiene (ADL/IADL).)
